overview: Animation division of 20th Century Studios (formerly 20th Century Fox)
note: Blue Sky Studios films (13 total) covered in separate project files

excluded_from_scope.blue_sky_studios: 13 films covered separately (Ice Age franchise, Rio franchise, Robots, etc.)
excluded_from_scope.diary_of_wimpy_kid: 4 animated films (2021-2025) produced by Walt Disney Pictures, not 20th Century Animation
excluded_from_scope.distributed_only: Films 20th Century only distributed (not produced) are excluded
